title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.6 - Flag day, june 14th, shall be observed in all schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 108.6 - Flag day, june 14th, shall be observed in all schools

State Regulations

Such observance may be in the nature of a special program, a review of the history of the flag, the initiation, development or culmination
of a project or unit of work pertaining to the flag, the study of a poem, essay
or other literature concerning the flag or a discussion of some phase or
problem of American life symbolized by the flag. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
108.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
